scripts.build:dirs: shx mkdir -p dist/assets/js dist/assets/css dist/assets/fonts dist/assets/icons dist/assets/images dist/assets/themes dist/partials
scripts.build:js: shx cp -f node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/assets/alpine.min.js && shx cp -r src/js/* dist/assets/js || shx echo no-js-src
scripts.build:fonts: shx cp -r src/assets/fonts/* dist/assets/fonts || shx echo no-fonts
scripts.build:icons: shx cp -r src/assets/icons/* dist/assets/icons || shx echo no-icons
scripts.build:images: shx cp -r src/assets/images/* dist/assets/images || shx echo no-images
scripts.build:themes: shx cp -r src/css/themes/* dist/assets/themes || shx echo no-themes
scripts.build:partials: shx cp -r src/partials/* dist/partials || shx echo no-partials
scripts.copy:misc: shx cp -f src/favicon.ico dist/ || shx echo no-favicon
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dirs && npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:icons && npm run build:images && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:themes && npm run build:partials && npm run copy:misc
